name: Pull Request Template
about: Use this template for pull requests
---

## Description
Provide a brief description of changes made in this PR.

## Type of Change
Mark the relevant type of change:
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Demo/tutorial addition or improvement

## Related Issues
Closes #(issue number)
Relates to #(issue number)

## Motivation and Context
Why is this change needed? What problem does it solve?

## Changes Made
Describe the key changes made in this PR. Be specific.

## Testing
Describe how you tested these changes:
- [ ] Code compiles/builds without errors
- [ ] Manually tested changes
- [ ] Automated tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)

## Screenshots (if applicable)
If this PR includes visual changes (UI, diagrams, etc.), include before/after screenshots.

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Additional Notes
Any additional context, considerations, or follow-up tasks.
